name: N24HourUrineProteinExcretion
title: 24 Hour Urine Protein Excretion
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing 24 Hour Urine Protein Excretion.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the total amount of protein excreted in the urine over a 24 hour period. includes both measured and predicted results.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for 24 Hour Urine Protein Excretion.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating 24 Hour Urine Protein Excretion.)
